channel.title: Huei-Yuan Yao's personal website
channel.description: Recent content on Huei-Yuan Yao's personal website

item.title: About
item.description: Hello. I am Huei-Yuan Yao. You can find my here. This is my personal website. I am new to GitHub and also GitHub Pages so this site is still under construction. I am willing to apply for the Doctorate degree in U.S. (Fall 2023). I got my master’s degree in Statistics, National Cheng-Chi University. Before master degree, I had my Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, National Taiwan University. My research interest includes (but not limited to) statistical inference of time series data, machine learning theory, sequential decision making under uncertainty and causal inference.

item.title: Contact
item.description: The primary mail address I am using is aaa0971020256@gmail.com. My Facebook and Instagram accounts are also available on this website. Please tell me who you are if you would like to contact me and I do not know you.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
